## Installation

Install plexr from GitHub which requires devtools:

``` {r, eval=F}
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("Close-your-eyes/plexr")
```

## Example

This is a basic example which shows you how to solve a common problem:

```{r, eval=F}
library(plexr)
```
